# SPATAData v.0.0.0.900 -> v1.0.0
We are excited to release SPATAData v1.0.0. The package aims to facilitate the distribution of spatial multi-omic data sets from a variety of platforms as well as publications. The downloaded objects are compatible with our newest release of SPATA2 v3.0.0.
